title: Strawberry Spinach Salad With Feta and Bacon
directions: Place spinach into a large salad bowl and slice strawberries over spinach; sprinkle with feta cheese, onion, and bacon bits. Pour raspberry dressing over salad and toss to coat.
ingredients: 1 small sweet onion (such as Vidalia), sliced
1/2 (16 ounce) bottle reduced-fat raspberry vinaigrette salad dressing (such as Kraft Raspberry Vinaigrette Lite)
